item.title: Center Selection Algorithm
item.description: Center Selection Algorithm   In the k-means algorithm, we can start with (i) using an initial partition {S1, S2, ..., Sk} or with (ii) using initial centers {c1, c2, ..., ck}. Design a good initialization method for k-means algorithm for (i) and also for (ii)
